Package nl.fw.yapool.sql

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    IQueryBuilder
    Creates (named) prepared statements for a connection.
    IQueryCache
    A query cache that closes queries when the pool destroys connections.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BoundQueryCache
    A SimpleQueryCache that also limits the amount of cached queries (see BoundQueryCache.setMaxOpen(int)).
    CachedStatement
    Helper class for QueryCache implementations.
    DbConn
    A helper class that makes it easy to fire a query, get results and cleanup.
    MariaDbFactory
    A PostgreSQL database connection factory.
    MySqlFactory
    A MySql database connection factory.
    MySqlPool
    A SqlPool that uses a MySqlFactory.
    NamedParameterStatement
    This class wraps around a PreparedStatement and allows the programmer to set parameters by name instead of by index.
    NPSCache
    Cache for Named Parameter Statement.
    PostgreSqlFactory
    A PostgreSQL database connection factory.
    QueryCacheStats
    Tracks hits/misses by query ID (sqlID).
    QueryStats
    Helper class for keeping track of hits/misses by query-ID.
    SimpleQueryBuilder
    A IQueryBuilder that uses the given sql-IDs as sql-statements.
    SimpleQueryCache
    A simple IQueryCache that also has the option to update some QueryCacheStats.
    SqlFactory  
    SqlPool
    A pruned pool that shares Connections.
